caption: The video begins with a woman holding a torch, followed by the appearance of a galaxy and then Earth. A man and a woman lean on each other near the seashore. A girl stands on the beach. The man approaches her, and they form a hand gesture, then blow on it. The boy and the girl hug tightly. A small planetoid flies by and collides with a spacecraft. Inside the spacecraft, a person awakens. The cabin begins to lose air pressure. The surroundings of the spaceship are filled with a fresh and bright atmosphere. By the window, a girl turns her head back.
